expression-projection.text: SUBSTRING(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([ST].[text], ([req].[statement_start_offset] / 2) + 1, ((CASE [req].[statement_end_offset] WHEN -1 THEN DATALENGTH([ST].[text]) ELSE [req].[statement_end_offset] END - [req].[statement_start_offset]) / 2) + 1 ), CHAR(10), ' ' ), CHAR(13), ' ' ), 1, 512 )

function.text: SUBSTRING(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([ST].[text], ([req].[statement_start_offset] / 2) + 1, ((CASE [req].[statement_end_offset] WHEN -1 THEN DATALENGTH([ST].[text]) ELSE [req].[statement_end_offset] END - [req].[statement_start_offset]) / 2) + 1 ), CHAR(10), ' ' ), CHAR(13), ' ' ), 1, 512 )

REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([ST].[text], ([req].[statement_start_offset] / 2) + 1, ((CASE [req].[statement_end_offset] WHEN -1 THEN DATALENGTH([ST].[text]) ELSE [req].[statement_end_offset] END - [req].[statement_start_offset]) / 2) + 1 ), CHAR(10), ' ' ), CHAR(13), ' ' )

REPLACE(SUBSTRING([ST].[text], ([req].[statement_start_offset] / 2) + 1, ((CASE [req].[statement_end_offset] WHEN -1 THEN DATALENGTH([ST].[text]) ELSE [req].[statement_end_offset] END - [req].[statement_start_offset]) / 2) + 1 ), CHAR(10), ' ' )

SUBSTRING([ST].[text], ([req].[statement_start_offset] / 2) + 1, ((CASE [req].[statement_end_offset] WHEN -1 THEN DATALENGTH([ST].[text]) ELSE [req].[statement_end_offset] END - [req].[statement_start_offset]) / 2) + 1 )

binary-operation-expression.text: CASE [req].[statement_end_offset] WHEN -1 THEN DATALENGTH([ST].[text]) ELSE [req].[statement_end_offset] END - [req].[statement_start_offset]
